overview.author: Darby Van Uitert
overview.summary: Remove one or more singleton axes from a nrrd. Singleton axes have only a single sample along them. The underlying linear ordering of the samples is unchanged, and the information about the other axes is shifted downwards as needed.

description.p: Remove one or more singleton axes from a nrrd. Singleton axes have only a single sample along them. The underlying linear ordering of the samples is unchanged, and the information about the other axes is shifted downwards as needed.
Axis: indicates the axis at which to delete the stub axis and should be an integer. Iff you give -1 as the axis, this will do a matlab-style squeeze, in which any and all singleton axes are removed.
